definitions.definition: The act of leaving a dangerous or unpleasant situation.
examples: The prisoners made their escape by digging a tunnel.

definitions.definition: Leakage or outflow , as of steam or a liquid , or an electric current through defective insulation .
Something that has escaped; an escapee .
A holiday , viewed as time away from the vicissitudes of life.
The text character represented by 27 (decimal) or 1B ( hexadecimal ).
examples: You forgot to insert an escape in the datastream.

definitions.definition: A successful shot from a snooker position.
A defective product that is allowed to leave a manufacturing facility.
That which escapes attention or restraint; a mistake , oversight , or transgression .
A cultivated plant found growing as though wild, dispersed by some agency.

main_definition: The act of leaving a dangerous or unpleasant situation.
secondary_definitions: Leakage or outflow , as of steam or a liquid , or an electric current through defective insulation .
Something that has escaped; an escapee .
A holiday , viewed as time away from the vicissitudes of life.
( programming ) The text character represented by 27 (decimal) or 1B ( hexadecimal ).
( snooker ) A successful shot from a snooker position.
( manufacturing ) A defective product that is allowed to leave a manufacturing facility.
( obsolete ) That which escapes attention or restraint; a mistake , oversight , or transgression .
( botany ) A cultivated plant found growing as though wild, dispersed by some agency.
